metadata.title: CVE-2021-1094 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability inthe kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape where an outof bounds array access may lead to denial of service or informationdisclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
